channel.title: Found the right timing :D
channel.description:
Hey guys - As this is to small to be a tut I thought it would fit in here :cool:
So... Lets get on to it
Remember the timing in Server.java they everyone forgets about? For the noobs: [code] public static final int cycleTime = [/code]
Well in every server I have come across inc. Delta: [code] //public static final int cycleTime = 500; [/code] Quoted out 'cause they havent found the timing
Allstar and Reapage and Project Czar: [code] // TODO: yet to figure out proper value for timing, but 500 seems good public static final int cycleTime = 500; [/code] ^^ Not all That I have come accross...
But... Turns out That 598 is the right timing!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! So make sure you have this is server.Java to get extreme players going "OMG?!?!!!!1111111111 nO LaGg!!!!!!!!!" No need for any credits to me on the server just keep the Copyright please :D [code] public static final int cycleTime = 598; // Turns out this is the right timing :D -- DJDoyle1 [/code]
Thanks!, ~~Doyle1

item.title: Found the right timing :D
item.dc:creator: @djdoyle1 djdoyle1
item.description:
@djdoyle1 wrote:

Hey guys - As this is to small to be a tut I thought it would fit in here

So… Lets get on to it

Remember the timing in Server.java they everyone forgets about?
For the noobs:

    public static final int cycleTime =

Well in every server I have come across inc.
Delta:

	//public static final int cycleTime = 500;

Quoted out 'cause they havent found the timing

Allstar and Reapage and Project Czar:

    // TODO: yet to figure out proper value for timing, but 500 seems good
    public static final int cycleTime = 500;

^^
Not all That I have come accross…

But…
Turns out
That 598 is the right timing!!!
So make sure you have this is server.Java to get extreme players going “OMG!!!1111111111 nO LaGg!!!” No need for any credits to me on the server just keep the Copyright please 

    public static final int cycleTime = 598; // Turns out this is the right timing :D -- DJDoyle1

Thanks!,
~~Doyle1

Read full topic
